triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: Core subject of the paper - intelligent autonomous agents that perceive their environment and decide on actions through reasoning.

triples.name: Symbolic artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper is explicitly framed as being within the subarea of symbolic artificial intelligence.

triples.name: Agent-oriented programming
triples.relevance: The focus of the survey is on agent-based programming and agent programming languages for developing multi-agent systems.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper reviews programming techniques and languages specifically designed for multi-agent systems.

triples.name: Agent-based model
triples.relevance: Agent simulation is one of the multitude of agent-related techniques explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

triples.name: Multi-agent planning
triples.relevance: Multi-agent planning is one of the key techniques in agent-based systems discussed in the paper.

triples.name: Argumentation framework
triples.relevance: Multi-agent argumentation is one of the multitude of techniques covered in the agent programming survey.
